colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BLO GROS KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS GRONG CHOG PA RNAMS KYIS THUGS SHING BSKONG BA'I SLAD DU BRE DGOS SU BSKUL BAR RTEN, SNYIGS DUS KYI MTHAR LA SLEB PAS RGYAL PO'I GNOD PA PA'I DUS 'DIR 'GA' ZHIG LA PHAN PA'ANG SRID DAM SNYAM PAS RGYAL PO'I MDOS GZHUNG SOGS KHUNGS THUB RNAMS KYI DON DANG MI 'GAL BAR BSGRIBS PA PO NI DHARMA SVA MI WA GINTRA PA tU SIDDHI'I MING CAN NO, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA RNAMS KYANG NGA RGYAL DANG ZHE LDANG GIS BSKUL BA'I GNOD BYED KYI 'CHAR SGO SNA TSOGS LAS MTHAR BAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, DGE BA'O, ,)
